title: No writing notes or assignments anymore
content:
If you are struggling to write your notes, assignments or homeworks don't worry I will write it for you at a very reasonable price per page only ₹15 less then a 20ruppes chocolate , for one diagram only ₹5 . 
"OFFER "
For 20 pages of writing only ₹220
For 30 pages of writing only ₹300
If you are interested DM me 
My whatsApp number is 9740213166
 (don't call please🙏🙏)

comments.body: Hero we didn't know we needed 🫡
I thought ki koi protest karre ho lol

Check dms for a clue on how to scale and make money, good luck , i don't generally give suggestions, much less for free, but I just felt you could be the one 😂 if u manage it u will be swimming in money
I appreciate a hustler . I made a fortune doing stuff similar but in other places without my own hands working 😂 so you can as well
Ummm i heard pesu teachers lurk here , might want to lookout for that!
And they say PESU doesn’t have great startup culture
